Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardsController
    This controller is responsible for cards choices when a match starts.
    DisconnectController
    This controller is responsible for in-game connection lost.
    GUIController
    This class provides the ability to switch between JavaFX scenes, and activate linked controller.
    MatchActiveController
    This is the main game controller.
    MatchStartController
    This controller is responsible for showing initial info about the match, and eventually making challenger choose start player.
    SettingsController
    This controller is responsible for taking user settings for the match
    SetupController
    This controller is responsible for game-starting setup.
    SplashController
    This is the default controller for this application.
